Introduction

Lee Chanhyuk, also known as Chanhyuk (찬혁), is a South Korean singer-songwriter under YG Entertainment. He is a member of the sibling duo AKMU, who rose to fame after winning the second season of K-pop Star in 2012.

YG Entertainment:

Fun facts

1
Chanhyuk and his sister Suhyun, along with their missionary parents lived in Mongolia for five years (May 2008 - 2012), before the siblings returned to South Korea and competed in the second season of K-Pop Star.
…
2
Despite not approving of any of Suhyun’s boyfriends, Chanhyuk still hopes that his sister feels happiness.
…
3
As of 2023, Suhyun’s contact name on Chanhyuk's phone is “Lee Suhyun”.
…
4
Chanhyuk's ultimate goal is to create a happy family, and he is ready to marry tomorrow if he can.
…
5
As of March 2025, he has moved in with Suhyun alongside their pet dog Jjome.
…
6
Chanhyuk is said to have a close relationship with Bang Yedam, especially after the latter left YG Entertainment. The two often talk about music, to which Yedam expresses his admiration for Chanhyuk's musical expression.
…
7
His “Hip Hop is not cool” meme won Best Meme at Show Me The Money 10 Festival.
…
8
He usually compares himself to a tree frog: “I feel like a frog in everything I do. I want to break free from the usual frameworks that people think normally. I believe there should be at least one person like me who has these useless thoughts in the world.” He collects many frog-themed accessories.
…
